website_summaries.verdict: This roller comes with a detachable head, to decrease the chances you'll break it if you drop it. Be sure to order the stainless steel model – it stays colder much longer.
pros: Detachable head reduces pressure and breakage in case item is accidentally dropped
Great for rosacea, TMJ and carpal tunnel
Reduces need for creams and treatments
Use on face and chest to look revitalized every morning
Use before and after cosmetic procedures to minimize discomfort, irritation, and redness
cons: Large for maneuvering comfortably around eyes and nose

customer_reviews.title: New Addiction.
customer_reviews.text: I am an esthetician and I love to try new products. I also have rosacea, and am very hot natured. I have broken capillaries on my cheeks as well. This product combined with some topical aloe from the natural foods store has changed my skin. And here is the best part. It makes my almost 40 year old skin feel super tight, and causes the skin to retain hydration better. I'm just mad that I did not try it sooner. I also had a minor snafu with my order and they instantly made it right! I can see this working well for menopause, post surgical, dry, and problematic skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Plez

customer_reviews.title: Seems to take away puffiness in the mornings. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to take away puffiness in the mornings. I also use it on joint pain which makes it easier than using direct ice that melts and gets all over the place. Seems a bit flimsy though so probably won't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Facial saver and thrilled i purchased this one, has aided me often latey!
customer_reviews.text: had eye surgery and left me with bags under my eyes so wanted to ice in am...this is very large but can use on other body parts if I get an ache that needs icing...UPDATING THIS ONE!!!! As I have used this way more then thought I would....after facial treatments it has been a real saver to my skin....from over treatment...thrilled I purchased and keep in my freezer for quick aid and help...it works...and is perfect to calm skin down!
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this after working out and it really does help relieve sore muscles. A nice thing to have ready for hot days too.
customer_reviews.author: mcdoeli

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR SWELLING
customer_reviews.text: My face is very swollen in the mornings so I needed something to combat it. I found the ice roller and immediately put it in the freezer once I received. This morning I rolled it all over my face and it helped my swelling a great amount! It’s also perfect to just wake up the skin because of the cooling effect. I also rolled it on a mosquito bite I had and it helped relieve the itching. I can’t wait to use this after waxing, I might just order the steel head version to have it last colder longer.
customer_reviews.author: viv

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: You won’t believe until you try how great this product is!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Replacement is much better
customer_reviews.text: I'm revising my review after the manufacture sent me a replacement for a defective unit I received. I've been using the ice roller to treat my TMJ and carpal tunnel syndrome. Tried a lot of Therapeutic cooling devices, but nothing has worked as good as the ice roller. My only wish is that the roller got a little bit colder. For that reason, I think I will try the professional model with The metal roller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Be careful can injure yourself
customer_reviews.text: For some reason amazon tries to take my post down while I attached with a picture . I used this one time and it severely burnt my skin I have two red marks on my cheeks .
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Every Day Use Item!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this! I got the plastic one and think it stays cold enough. I use it everyday and have definitely seen a difference in how puffy my skin looks. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday and love it! Has helped tremendously with my
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday and love it! Has helped tremendously with my headaches
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Mann

customer_reviews.title: This is great.. really leaves the face feeling fresh and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great..really leaves the face feeling fresh and firm.​I use it all the time. just have to remember to put it where I can see it. good product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo awesome! This is the best thing ever when you’re hung over and dying. And I’m sure for other stuff too, but just a heads up ya know?
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. It's great for after facials that leave your skin red and irritated. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to help sooth their tired skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bitzy

customer_reviews.title: Boo-boo Bunny for Grown-ups.
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I think of this? It works for so many ailments, beautifully designed and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: This is great for cooling your face during a hangover or just ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cooling your face during a hangover or just to tighten up the muscles now and then. Be warned, the roller is made out of plastic, not a stone, which was kind of a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports type inflammation or injuries that are accessible
customer_reviews.text: Great for muscle injuries soreness. Much easier than putting ice on it and works well. I guess it is used for surgeries and this is why it was suggested by a member at my gym or "studio" for me to really zone in on quad area or a reachable area only. You have to be able to access the area easily to roll over it. would be good on the neck area, calves, ankles, feet depending upon your flexibliity level This is the best price I saw on the internet at the time of purchase. You can throw it in the freezer and re use it and if you can use for your children's "boo-boos" or bruises too.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Shopper Seller

customer_reviews.title: This feels nice, but I just don't think it does anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading a rave review on Refinery29 or Into The Gloss (can't remember which). This feels nice, but I just don't think it does anything to depuff my eye area when I first wake up. Holding a cold can of Coke to my eyes works just the same. I also wish the roller were a smaller size to maneuver around your face more easily. Overall I just don't think it is effective as it claims to be at de-puffing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Jennings Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay cold too long
customer_reviews.text: I like the mechanism and the ease of rolling it, but it doesn't feel that cold for very long. It is soothing to roll on my jaws and face for TMJ problems. I just pop it back in freezer and wait a while. Overall, not bad.
customer_reviews.author: L. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This product is so great! I have always been a fan of using ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great! I have always been a fan of using ice cubes on my face to reduce inflammation and puffy eyes. It also works great on bad pimples, as it helps to reduce redness and tenderness. This handy tool is so smart- I wish I thought of it! Now I don't need to hold ice cubes up to my eyes and deal with the ice melting and getting my face wet. The temperature of the roller is actually not as cold as real ice, which works well since you're applying directly to your face/neck. Very happy indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Was recommended by my massage therapist
customer_reviews.text: Provides relief for aches and pains in arms. Was recommended by my massage therapist, and she was right.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Secret hangover tool
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing way to start the day. Perfect for reducing puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definite Must for the Mornings
customer_reviews.text: Another product I read about from bloggers. I cannot wait to wash my face in the morning and use this ice roller. It reduces puffiness and pore size and makes me feel so refreshed and energized for the day. I can definitely tell the difference when I use in the morning and my face feels and looks wonderful. It only takes a few minutes and is a definite must in my morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: McZack

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot go a morning routine without this...especially during allergy season! I can't do the ice facial because it's so intense so I bight this...game changer...just buy it you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device! I have very sensitive skin, I use this roller on my face whenever my skin is irritated or I have a breakout, it's wonderful!!! Stays cold & is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it it will wake you up I give it 5star.lote
customer_reviews.author: birgit prather

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Well the device it self does well im aspects of face tightening and it makes a visible difference in a month or so
customer_reviews.author: klaudia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well on tense muscles in my neck. Well worth the money. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and delivery. Love this product. Feels amazing on my forehead and jaws after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: I used this for "trigger finger" swelling. Sure does work better than messy ice packs.
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of messy ice packs for my "trigger finger" swelling which occurred in a bad fall. I keep it in the freezer so I can use it whenever it is needed. My occupational therapist told me to use ice on my right hand about 20 minutes at a time. This ice roller lasted for 20 minutes for sure, maybe even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great balm for sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Hansderma aloe balm because I love my Hansderma ice roller and I wanted to test both products together. The aloe balm is a great gel to help with sore muscle relief. I especially like that it doesn't smell bad like similar products like Bengay or Icee Hot. The aloe balm has a neutral smell and works just as well - in fact, when you apply the balm and then use the ice roller, it does an even better job of making your sore muscles feel better. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Malenius

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Was not as cool as I had wanted. Even their "professional" version still wasn't cool enough. :/
customer_reviews.author: Robert Biehn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have received my product, and i'd been using it everyday and loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherfi

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Could Have Tried It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product twice and both times it broke the first time I put it in the freezer. Totally bummed because I was really excited to try it but unfortunately I won't be ordering it again as I don't want to risk another one breaking, only to have to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Katie Droen

customer_reviews.title: metal
customer_reviews.text: its would have beed good to have to option for the metal roller instead of just a plastic one which doesnt hold cold as long
customer_reviews.author: Julie elkins

customer_reviews.title: It couldn't withstand the freezer temperature and broke off. ...
customer_reviews.text: It couldn't withstand the freezer temperature and broke off. It kept forming icicles where it should be smoothing rolling. It was unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Neill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for morning puffiness! Seller sent me the pro version, although I paid for the cheaper one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Denica Petkova

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty wonderful. It cools my skin after treatments as well making it look good each day. And for headaches it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Official wife-approved, which brings joy
customer_reviews.text: When my wife asked me to get this for her, I couldn't for the life of me figure out what this is. Can't you just take an ice pack and slap it on your face? Of course when I said that, she grabbed a bag of frozen peas and I soon realized the obvious. This ice roller seemed to work really well after certain skin treatments, as attested by my wife. So happy wife, happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Samwise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it for laser treatments, can use just to tighten skin, instead of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: and COOL my skin
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the "BEST" skin care tool I have ever used/purchased (and that is quite a few!). I now actually look forward to my night routine and after the cleansing, moisturizing, etc. I use this tool to help relax, calm, and COOL my skin. I will definitely be using this tool forever and will refer several friends to it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurene F-B

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don’t even care if it works, it feels amazing on your face! I do see a little less puffiness, which is good. It stays colder longer then my rose quartz face roller too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M

customer_reviews.title: Didnt like it
customer_reviews.text: Its a neat concept but mine broke really quickly, the roller part kept falling off
customer_reviews.author: A. Alba

customer_reviews.title: This works great! Ice is so sloppy to use for swelling
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Ice is so sloppy to use for swelling, and this doesn't get you wet like ice does.
customer_reviews.author: scratch1

customer_reviews.title: better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Thus thing is great on hot days but also works well to bring down a puffy face. I use it on my eyes and it's a life saver. Works wonders when suffering from a headache too! Highly recommend this to anyone and all women!
customer_reviews.author: merriejayne

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice roller. Great for sore muscles, headache, back ache. Stays cold for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Johnneen J.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter recommended this roller (she has one)
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recommended this roller (she has one). I'm glad I listened. It's effective in reducing puffy eyes and kinda wakes me up in the morning 😃 It arrived on time and I would highly recommend this roller!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Coble

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this Ice roller after use RF treatments and almost every day because help to toning the skin and lately use too for some parts like arms or legs for toning too this is the best roller I use and have great price , I completely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazona 1

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, but I agree with other viewers, it doesn't feel that cold for very long....and it broke when I dropped it.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Roller!  Makes it so easy to target the area one wants to treat.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, well made roller. Perfect for anyone's medical kit or for use after a workout. Great for headaches and for muscle pains. Small and lightweight, fits in my freezer very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: PinBox

customer_reviews.title: Practically unuseable
customer_reviews.text: The item would be ideal... if it did not come apart at the sligest touch, rendering it virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer person

customer_reviews.title: Bliss in your freezer
customer_reviews.text: I received my Skincool Ice Roller yesterday and popped it in the freezer. I couldn't wait to get home from work today to try it...because today was such a hot day, my house was hot, and I had a headache. Ahhhh...bliss! The delight of this experience is beyond words. The device is of good durable quality. I ordered the metal version, and it stayed cool for a good 30 minutes or more. Felt heavenly on my face and neck. Hansderma is an ethical company with their hearts and minds in the right place. They will take good care of you! Go for it--you deserve the Skincool Ice Roller! You'll be soooo happy!
customer_reviews.author: India Ballinger

customer_reviews.title: Worth it... Good for beauty purposes as well as aches and pains.
customer_reviews.text: I only tried it once. I keep forgetting to do it. But it helps with my joint pain and it felt great on my face in the blistering heat of summer.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrina

customer_reviews.title: Item came quickly and i put in the freezer once ...
customer_reviews.text: Item came quickly and i put in the freezer once it came. Tried to roll on my face and it broke with the first use. Save your money and don't order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite beauty products!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product for relieving pain, reducing puffy eyes in the morning or when cooling off on a hot day. I LOVE it! My husband loves using it too. The roller stays cold for a long period of time. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. For sore shoulders/neck this works as a GREAT ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. For sore shoulders/neck this works as a GREAT massage. Especially if you have someone else do it to you. Keeps the massagers hands from tiring too quickly, too.
customer_reviews.author: AStaker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The roller is wonderful and helps reduce swelling! Thanks so much for offering this!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all items are received
customer_reviews.text: I received the item with just the roller in the box. I didn't receive the handle. The box had been opened.
customer_reviews.author: ShellieT

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Feels fantastic! I get a lot of migraines. While this doesn't take away the pain, it definitely eases the pain. Feels great on a hot day!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry F Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It doesn't irritate sensitive skin and really helps when I'm itchy.

customer_reviews.title: have used this every day and love it. It is a stress-reliever and helps with ...
customer_reviews.text: have used this every day and love it. It is a stress-reliever and helps with my puffy "morning eyes". My niece used it for an achey neck and it worked for her,

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not a great product should have bought the one wrapped in stainless steel 😖

customer_reviews.title: their customer service department is amazing! The roller works really well for when I ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived broken. I called the company and they couldn't have been nicer. They replaced it immediately, their customer service department is amazing! The roller works really well for when I have headaches. I keep it in the freezer and snap it right into the handle when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Bethumz

customer_reviews.title: I like the product.
customer_reviews.text: It is very relaxing and refreshing! Easy to use I wish they had smaller rollers for the eyes or lips.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ice roller to use on my knees after my workout. It is perfect because it allows me to focus on a specific area without having to tie a bag of ice to my knees that will eventually fall as it melts. Excellent product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jinks

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the quality. When I ordered it I assumed it was the metal roller for the price I paid. It was a cheap plastic. I'll probably return it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: It is not really cold or cool as ice cube. I used to use ice cube for rubbing my face after washing my face. For me, since I bought it, I started considering some issues regarding hygiene of usage ice roller all time (storage issue) and temperature as it called 'ice roller'. ( I stored this product in freezer all time) . I think shipping was fast. Anyway, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: They are literally selling a piece of plastic that when you put in the freezer gets cold and then you put that on your face. There is nothing revolutionary or any hidden science behind it. The roller is plastic, the plastic gets cold, you put the cold roller in your face; you could literally do this with any other object that resembles a roller. For the price, I would not, at all, recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I stick the whole thing in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I stick the whole thing in the fridge instead of popping the roller part out. Wish there was like a... Case to keep it in to keep it clean Bc I use it on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Maye

product_meta.title: Hansderma Skin Cool Ice Roller At-Home for Face and Body Massage
product_meta.description: Skin cool ice roller is a handheld device that can be frozen effectively in the freezer. It can be used at anytime and any place for sore muscle, tension, pain and discomfort. Skin cool ice roller can be also used daily to revitalize, refresh and rejuvenate the skin. It is a simple, easy and economic way to keep your skin young and healthy. Keep it in the freezer at all times. Use whenever desired on face and body. Skin cool ice roller at-home: Plastic head (white) + blue handle skin cool ice roller professionals: Stainless steel head (silver) + white handle.
feature_bullets: Use ice roller before and after cosmetic procedures, it minimizes discomforts, irritation, and redness
Use ice roller on your face, neck and chest every morning (ice cube facials), your face will look revitalized and young
Use ice roller on your eyes when you feel fatigue
Roll over any part of your body for instant pain relief, it is a must have item at home for minor injury, burn and insect bites without making mess
Head detachable, it does not easily break with pressure or when the item is accidentally dropped
